name: zkflow-pro-extension
description: Zero Knowledge Form Flow Pro - Smart form automation Chrome extension

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy
scripts.copy: mkdir -p dist && cp -r manifest.json src assets dist/
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../zkflow-pro.zip *
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch src --watch manifest.json --exec npm run build

author: zkFlow.pro
